LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_getSignalNumber()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the number extracted from the signal's Code, e.g. '4313UL' or 'UL4313' or '4313' => '4313'.
LuaFunction.Formula: function NOBN_sig_getSignalNumber(s) if s == nil then s = getObjectFromId(id) end -- Assume object really IS a signal... local c = tostring(s.Code) if c == nil then return "" end if c:match("%d+%D+") then -- digits + nondigits: return c:match("%d+%D+"):match("%d+") elseif c:match("%D+%d+") then -- nondigits + digits: return c:match("%D+%d+"):match("%d+") elseif c:match("%d+") then -- just digits: return c:match("%d+") else -- just nondigits, or empty: return "" end end

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_getSignalLitra()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the litra extracted from the signal's Code, e.g. '4313UL' or 'UL4313' or 'UL' => 'UL'.
LuaFunction.Formula: function NOBN_sig_getSignalLitra(s) if s == nil then s = getObjectFromId(id) end -- Assume object really IS a signal... local c = tostring(s.Code) if c == nil then return "" end if c:match("%d+%D+") then -- digits + nondigits: return c:match("%d+%D+"):match("%D+") elseif c:match("%D+%d+") then -- nondigits + digits: return c:match("%D+%d+"):match("%D+") elseif c:match("%D+") then -- just nondigits: return c:match("%D+") else -- just digits, or empty: return "" end end

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the formated short name extracted from a main/distant signal's Code, e.g. '4313UL' or 'UL4313' => '4313(UL)'.
LuaFunction.Formula: function NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName() if NOBN_sig_getSignalLitra() == "" then return NOBN_sig_getSignalNumber() else return NOBN_sig_getSignalNumber().."("..NOBN_sig_getSignalLitra()..")" end end

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_getSignalFullName()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the elaborate name of the signal, formated according to Bane NOR standard practice.
LuaFunction.Formula:
function NOBN_sig_getSignalFullName() local t if RcType == "SA-SIG ERTMS" then return "Mb."..NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName()
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Signal" then if (MainSignal == "Hs1") then t = "Stopplykt" elseif (MainSignal == "RepHs1" or MainSignal == "RepHs2") then t = "Rep.Hs." elseif (MainSignal ~= "-") then t = "Hs." elseif (DistantSignal ~= "-") then t = "Fs." elseif (DwarfSignal ~= "-") then return "Ds.R"..NOBN_sig_getSignalNumber() elseif (HighShuntingSignal ~= "-") then t = "Z." else t = "Sig." end return t..NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName()
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Fiktivt punkt" then t = "Fik." if Variant == "Viapunkt for betjeningsanlegg" then return t..code elseif Variant == "Fiktivt sluttpunkt for togvei" then return t..NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName().." (HTv)" elseif Variant == "Fiktivt sluttpunkt for skiftevei" then return t..NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName().." (DTv)" elseif Variant == "Fiktivt sluttpunkt for togvei og skiftevei" then return t..NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName().." (HTv/DTv)" else return t..NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName().." (Bad variant ["..Variant.."])",_warning end
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Togsporsignal" then s = "Togsporsignal "..code elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Høyt skiftesignal" then --(Frittstående) s = "Høyt skiftesignal "..code elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Brosignal/Frostportsignal" then s = "Brosignal/Frostportsignal "..code elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Rasvarslingsignal" then s = "Rasvarslingsignal "..code elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Veisignal" then s = "Veisignal "..code elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Planovergangsignal" then s = "Planovergangsignal "..code else s = "Bad signal type ["..RcType.."] (code='"..code.."').",_warning end return s end

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_getSignalPartNames()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the signal component names, formated according to Bane NOR standard practice.
LuaFunction.Formula:
function NOBN_sig_getSignalPartNames() local s = "" if RcType == "SA-SIG ERTMS" then if Variant:find("E34") then s = s.."Sted" elseif Variant:find("E35") then s = s.."Stopp" elseif Variant:find("ERTMS Planovergang, forsignal") then s = s.."PLO-Fs" elseif Variant:find("ERTMS Planovergang, signal") then s = s.."PLO" elseif Variant:find("ERTMS Shunting Area begynner") then s = s.."Sh.start" elseif Variant:find("ERTMS Shunting Area slutter") then s = s.."Sh.slutt" elseif Variant:find("ERTMS Supervised Area slutter") then s = s.."Sup.slutt" else s = s.."Bad ERTMS board type ["..Variant.."]." end
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Signal" then if (prop("Hovedsignal") ~= "-") then s = s..prop("Hovedsignal") elseif (prop("Forsignal") == "Ja") then s = s.."-Fs" elseif (prop("Dvergsignal") == "Ja") then s = s.."-Ds" elseif (prop("Middelkontrollampe") == "Ja") then s = s.."-Mk" elseif (prop("Forsiktig kjøring") == "Ja") then s = s.."-FKs" elseif (prop("Hovedlinjesignal") == "Ja") then s = s.."-HLs" elseif (prop("Lysende hastighetssignal") == "Ja") then s = s.."-Hast" elseif (prop("Høyt skiftesignal") == "Ja") then s = s.."-Z" elseif s:sub(1,1) == "-" then s = s:sub(2) else s = s.."Bad Class B signal configuration." end
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Togsporsignal" then s = "Togsporsignal" elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Høyt skiftesignal" then --Frittstående høyt skiftesignal! s = "Høyt skiftesignal "..code elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Brosignal/Frostportsignal" then s = "Brosignal/Frostportsignal" elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Rasvarslingsignal" then s = "Rasvarslingsignal" elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Veisignal" then s = "Veisignal" elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Planovergangsignal" then s = "Planovergangsignal"
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Fiktivt punkt" then s = "Fiktivt punkt"
else s = "Bad signal type ["..RcType.."].",_warning end return s:match("%-(%w+)",1) --Strip off leading dash character '-' end

Variant.Name: Fiktivt sluttpunkt for togvei og skiftevei

InsertSymbol.VariantName: Fiktivt sluttpunkt for togvei og skiftevei

SymbolDefinition.BlockNameFormat: NO-BN-2D-JBTSI-SIGNAL {% if Variant == 'Viapunkt for betjeningsanlegg' %}VIAPUNKT {% else %}FIKTIVT-PUNKT {% endif %}

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_chkSafetyDistanceFromSignalToOcsMast()
LuaFunction.Description: Checks whether Returns the formated short name extracted from a main/distant signal's Code, e.g. '4313UL' or 'UL4313' => '4313(UL)'.
LuaFunction.Formula:
function NOBN_sig_chkSafetyDistanceFromSignalToOcsMast() tolerance = 6 --Tolerance in meters
if RcType == "SA-SIG Signal" then --Free-standing dwarf signal? if (DwarfSignal == "Ja" and MainSignal == "-") then return "OK - Free-standing shunting signal - Safety distance to OCS mast not relevant.", _ok end end
if RcType == "SA-SIG Togsporsignal" then return "OK - Track signal (togsporsignal) - Safety distance to OCS mast not relevant.", _ok
elseif RcType ~= "SA-SIG Signal" and RcType ~= "SA-SIG Høyt skiftesignal" and RcType ~= "SA-SIG Veisignal" and RcType ~= "SA-SIG Brosignal/Frostportsignal" and RcType ~= "SA-SIG Planovergang" then return "Bad signal type ["..RcType.."] (code='"..code.."'.",_warning
else c1 = getNearbyPointObjects2D("EH-MAS KL-mast", tolerance) c2 = getNearbyPointObjects2D("EH-MAS Tunnel-hengemast", tolerance) c3 = getNearbyPointObjects2D("EH-MAS Åk-hengemast", tolerance) closeObjects = getUnionOfCollections( getCollectionFromTable({c1,c2,c3}) ) count = getCollectionLength(closeObjects) UpdateObjects = {} if(count == 0) then return "OK - No catenary mast within tolerance "..tolerance.." meters.", _ok else i = 0 shortestDistance = math.huge text = ": WARNING - Catenary mast" if (count > 1) then text = text.."s" end text = text.." [" while (i ~= count) do d = RC__getDistance3D(closeObjects[i]) if d < shortestDistance then shortestDistance = d end text = text..closeObjects[i].code table.insert(UpdateObjects, closeObjects[i]) i = i+1 if (i ~= count) then text = text..", " end end preamble = string.format("%.3f",shortestDistance) return preamble..text.."] located inside tolerance "..tolerance.." meters.", UpdateObjects,_warning end end end

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_chkLeftSideDistanceFromSignalToTrack()
LuaFunction.Description: Checks lateral distance from signal insertion point to closest track on left side (in the direction of increasing mileages).
LuaFunction.Formula: function NOBN_sig_chkLeftSideDistanceFromSignalToTrack() if (Alignment == nil or getAlignmentInfo().AlignmentName== "") then return "No track(s) found.",_warning end if (DwarfSignal == "Ja" and MainSignal == "-" and PoleOrYoke == "Yoke") then return "WARNING - Shunting signal mounted in yoke. Please do manual check.", _warning end if (RelativeElevation > 0.3) then return "WARNING - Signal mounted outside normal elevations. Please do manual check.", _warning end tracks = getClosestAlignments("KO-SPO Spor") if (tracks[0] == nil) then return "WARNING - Drawing contains no tracks.", _warning end counter = 0 trackToTheLeft = tracks[0] while tracks[counter] do if getAlignmentInfo(tracks[counter].id).DistanceToAlignment > 0 then trackToTheLeft = tracks[counter] break end counter = counter + 1 end if (getAlignmentInfo(trackToTheLeft.id).DistanceToAlignment <= 0) then return "No tracks to the left of signal.", _ok end alignmentInfo = getAlignmentInfo(trackToTheLeft.id) curveRadius = alignmentInfo.CurveRadius Ki = 0.0 Ky = 0.0 tolerance = 2.12 if (DwarfSignal == "Ja" and MainSignal == "-") then tolerance = tolerance + 0.25 else tolerance = tolerance + 0.4 end distToAlignment = math.abs(alignmentInfo.DistanceToAlignment) if (curveRadius ~= math.huge) then Ki = 81000.0/(2*curveRadius) Ky = 63000.0/(2*curveRadius) end if (alignmentInfo.CurveRotation == "CCW") then tolerance = tolerance + (Ky/1000.0) else tolerance = tolerance + (Ki/1000.0) end if (distToAlignment <= tolerance) then return string.format("%.3f: ERROR - Signal too close to track '%s' w.r.t. tolerance %.3f.", distToAlignment,alignmentInfo.AlignmentName,tolerance),_error elseif (distToAlignment > tolerance and distToAlignment <= (tolerance + 0.4)) then return string.format("%.3f: WARNING - Signal close to track '%s', but within 0.4m from tolerance %.3f.", distToAlignment,alignmentInfo.AlignmentName,tolerance),_warning else return string.format("%.3f: OK - Signal is far from tracks w.r.t. tolerance %.3f.", distToAlignment,tolerance),_ok end end

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_chkRightSideDistanceFromSignalToTrack()
LuaFunction.Description: Checks lateral distance from signal insertion point to closest track on right side (in the direction of increasing mileages).
LuaFunction.Formula: function NOBN_sig_chkRightSideDistanceFromSignalToTrack() if (Alignment == nil or getAlignmentInfo().AlignmentName== "") then return "No track(s) found.",_warning end if (DwarfSignal == "Ja" and MainSignal == "-" and PoleOrYoke == "Yoke") then return "WARNING - Shunting signal mounted in yoke. Please do manual check.", _warning end if (RelativeElevation > 0.3) then return "WARNING - Signal mounted outside normal elevations. Please do manual check.", _warning end tracks = getClosestAlignments("KO-SPO Spor") if (tracks[0] == nil) then return "WARNING - Drawing contains no tracks.", _warning end counter = 0 trackToTheRight = tracks[0] while tracks[counter] do if getAlignmentInfo(tracks[counter].id).DistanceToAlignment > 0 then trackToTheRight = tracks[counter] break end counter = counter + 1 end if (getAlignmentInfo(trackToTheRight.id).DistanceToAlignment <= 0) then return "No tracks to the right of signal.", _ok end alignmentInfo = getAlignmentInfo(trackToTheRight.id) curveRadius = alignmentInfo.CurveRadius Ki = 0.0 Ky = 0.0 tolerance = 2.12 if (DwarfSignal == "Ja" and MainSignal == "-") then tolerance = tolerance + 0.25 else tolerance = tolerance + 0.4 end distToAlignment = math.abs(alignmentInfo.DistanceToAlignment) if (curveRadius ~= math.huge) then Ki = 81000.0/(2*curveRadius) Ky = 63000.0/(2*curveRadius) end if (alignmentInfo.CurveRotation == "CCW") then tolerance = tolerance + (Ky/1000.0) else tolerance = tolerance + (Ki/1000.0) end if (distToAlignment <= tolerance) then return string.format("%.3f: ERROR - Signal too close to track '%s' w.r.t. tolerance %.3f.", distToAlignment,alignmentInfo.AlignmentName,tolerance),_error elseif (distToAlignment > tolerance and distToAlignment <= (tolerance + 0.4)) then return string.format("%.3f: WARNING - Signal close to track '%s', but within 0.4m from tolerance %.3f.", distToAlignment,alignmentInfo.AlignmentName,tolerance),_warning else return string.format("%.3f: OK - Signal is far from tracks w.r.t. tolerance %.3f.", distToAlignment,tolerance),_ok end end

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_getModel3DName()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns 3D Model Name for a Bane NOR NSI-63 type signal, based on CustomProperties such as Hovedsignal, Forsignal, Dvergsignal etc.
LuaFunction.Formula: function NOBN_sig_getModel3DName() local t = "NO-BN-3D-SA-SIG-NSI63" if (MainSignal == "-") then if (DistantSignal == "-") then --Nothing... else t = t.."-2-LYS" end elseif (MainSignal == "Hs1") and (DistantSignal == "-") then t = t.."-1-LYS" elseif (MainSignal == "RepHs1") and (DistantSignal == "-") then t = t.."-1-LYS" elseif (MainSignal == "RepHs2" or MainSignal == "Hs2") and (DistantSignal == "-") then t = t.."-2-LYS" elseif (MainSignal == "Hs3" and DistantSignal == "-") then t = t.."-3-LYS" elseif (MainSignal == "RepHs2" or MainSignal == "Hs2" and DistantSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-4-LYS" elseif (MainSignal == "Hs3" and DistantSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-5-LYS" else return _error,"Bad combination of Rep / Main Signal and DistantSignal." end if (DwarfSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-DS" end if (CautiousDrivingSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-FKS32" end if (LineSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-HLS" end if (PositionLamp ~= "-") then t = t.."-MK" end if (OpticalSpeedSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-S68E" end if (HighShuntingSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-Z" end if SunScreen == "-" then t = t.."-UTEN-SKJERM" end if PoleOrYoke == "Yoke" then t = t.."-ÅK" end return t end

CustomAttribute.Name: SunScreen
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Blind' custom property [- | Ja] decides whether the signal has background screen ('Ja') or not ('-').

CustomAttribute.Name: MainSignal
CustomAttribute.Description:
Bane NOR 1/2/3-lantern optical main signal.
20a=*Red:Stop(entry/block)
20b=Red:Stop(intermediate/exit)
21(3-light main)=UpperGreen:Proceed with caution
21(2-light main)=LowerGreen:Proceed with caution
21(repeater)=UpperGreen:Proceed with caution
22=UpperGreen+LowerGreen:Proceed.

CustomAttribute.Name: EndOfTrainRoute
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR S66 black/yellow board:End of train route movement authority (with or without an ensuing main signal).

CustomAttribute.Name: DistantSignal
CustomAttribute.Description:
Bane NOR 2-lantern optical distant signal.
23=*Yellow:Stop ahead
24=*Yellow/*Green:Reduced speed ahead
25=*Green:Line speed ahead.

CustomAttribute.Name: DwarfSignal
CustomAttribute.Description:
Bane NOR optical shunting signal.
43=TwoHorizontalWhite:Shunting forbidden
44=TwoSlantedWhite:Cautious shunting
45=TwoVerticalWhite:Shunting allowed
46a=OneWhite:local release
46b=TwoBackslantedWhite:Local release.

CustomAttribute.Name: PositionLamp
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR Position Lamp optical signal.\n.4C=*White:Last axle still occupying turnout section. Off:Trigger section not yet entered, or last axle not occupying turnout section anymore.

CustomAttribute.Name: CautiousDrivingSignal
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR Cautious Driving optical signal.\n32=White luminescent cross:Proceed with extra caution in train route (main signal shows Hs21, distant signal is shut off (Fs00).

CustomAttribute.Name: LineSignal
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR Line optical signal.\n35B=White luminescent letter:The signal shows a distinct letter representing one of several destination lines.

CustomAttribute.Name: OpticalSpeedSignal
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR Deviating Speed optical signal.\n.68C=WhiteDigit(s):Allowed speed over deviating turnout or group of turnouts ahead.

CustomAttribute.Name: HighShuntingSignal
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR High Shunting optical signal.\n41=SlantedWhiteLine:Cautious shunting with local release\n42=HorizontalWhiteLine:Shunting forbidden.

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_SafetyDistanceFromSignalToOcsMast
CustomAttribute.Description: Below 6 meter: Warning – Signal is too close to OCS mast, a potential HVAC hazard for maintenance personnel.\nAbove 6 meter: OK – No known HVAC danger to personnel.

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_LeftSideDistanceFromSignalToTrack
CustomAttribute.Description:
Dwarf signal:\Below 2.37m: Error – Signal too close to track.
From 2.37m to 2.77m: Warning – Within tolerance, potentially too close to track.
Above 2.77m: OK – Far enough from track.

Other signals:
Below 2.52m: Error - Signal too close to track.
From 2.52m to 2.92m: Warning - Within tolerance, potentially too close to track.
Above 2.92m: OK - Far enough from track.

The calculations take into account the nose/coach midpoint curvature extension.

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_RightSideDistanceFromSignalToTrack
CustomAttribute.Description:
Dwarf signal:\Below 2.37m: Error – Signal too close to track.
From 2.37m to 2.77m: Warning – Within tolerance, potentially too close to track.
Above 2.77m: OK – Far enough from track.

Other signals:
Below 2.52m: Error - Signal too close to track.
From 2.52m to 2.92m: Warning - Within tolerance, potentially too close to track.
Above 2.92m: OK - Far enough from track.

The calculations take into account the nose/coach midpoint curvature extension.

CustomAttribute.Name: Size
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Size' custom attribute [Large | Small] decides the board's size (Large:700x700, Small:400x400).

LuaFunction.Name: _SA_SIG_ERTMS_ArrowDirection()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the arrow direction for ERTMS board (where relevant) [leftArrow | rightArrow | downArrow | noArrow].
LuaFunction.Formula: function _SA_SIG_ERTMS_ArrowDirection() if Variant:find("sidestilt") then if RightSided then return dir == 'up' and 'leftArrow' or 'rightArrow' else return dir == 'up' and 'rightArrow' or 'leftArrow' end elseif Variant:find("nedpil") then return 'downArrow' else return 'noArrow' end end

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_ERTMS_Model3DName()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the 3D model name for the current ERTMS board [String]. Covers position/stop markerboards as well as other ERTMS board types.
LuaFunction.Formula: function NOBN_sig_ERTMS_Model3DName() --Board type: t = "NO-BN-3D-KO-SKT-ERTMS" if Variant:find("E34") then t = t.."-POSITION" elseif Variant:find("E35") then t = t.."-STOP" elseif Variant:find("Planovergang") then t = t.."-LX" elseif Variant:find("Shunting") then t = t.."-SHUNTING-AREA" t = t..(Variant:find("begynner") and "-BEGIN" or "-END") elseif Variant:find("Supervised") then t = t.."-SUPERVISED-AREA" t = t..(Variant:find("begynner") and "-BEGIN" or "-END") else return "Bad Variant ["..Variant.."], cannot determine 3D Model Name.",_error end --Placement Right/Left/Above (relevant only for STOP and POSITION markers): if Variant:find("sidestilt") then if RightSided then t = (dir == 'up') and t.."-RIGHT" or t.."-LEFT" else t = (dir == 'up') and t.."-LEFT" or t.."-RIGHT" end elseif Variant:find("nedpil") then t = t.."-ABOVE" else --Do nothing for boards that don't depend on position) end --Size: if Size == "Large" then t = t.."-700x700" elseif Size == "Small" then t = t.."-400x400" else return "Bad Variant ["..Variant.."], cannot determine 3D Model Name.",_error end return t end

LuaExpression.Name: Model3DName
LuaExpression.Formula: local t = "NO-BN-3D-SA-SIG-NSI63-TOGSPORSIGNAL-" if Variant == "Togsporsignal 1-begrep" then return t.."HODE" elseif Variant == "Togsporsignal 1-begrep, sidestilt" then t = t.."HODE-MED-ARM" if RightSided then return (dir == 'up') and t.."-HSIDE" or t.."-VSIDE" else return (dir == 'up') and t.."-VSIDE" or t.."-HSIDE" end elseif Variant == "Togsporsignal 2-begrep" then return t.."HODER-MED-ARMER" elseif Variant == "Togsporsignal 2-begrep, sidestilt" then return t.."HODER-MED-ARMER" else return "Bad Variant ["..Variant.."], cannot determine 3D Model Name.",_warning end

LuaExpression.Name: Offset3D.Z
LuaExpression.Formula: local a = Attachment local d = (Variant:find("sidestilt") or Variant:find("2%-begrep")) and 0.15 or 0 --juster litt ned hvis signalet har arm(er) if a ~= nil then if a.Variant:find(" 1.6m") then return 0.690 - d elseif a.Variant:find(" 2m") then return 1.090 - d elseif a.Variant:find(" 3m") then return 2.090 - d elseif a.Variant:find(" 3.2m") then return 2.290 - d else return 1.090 - d end else return 1.090 - d --Standard Ø76 stolpe er 2m høy end

SymbolDefinition.BlockNameFormat: NO-BN-2D-JBTSI-SIGNAL-VEISIGNAL {% if Variant == 'Veisignal/Enkelt signal mot vei' %}1 {% elsif Variant == 'Veisignal/Dobbelt signal mot vei' %}2 {% endif %}
